	Ashwin Kumar
	IIT Delhi */
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cassert>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<string>
#include<ctime>
#include<deque>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<set>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>	
using namespace std;

typedef pair<int, int> pii;
typedef long long LL;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define INF 1000000000
#define MAX 10000000000000000LL

set<LL> poss;

int main() {
	for (LL a = 2; a <= 220000; a++) {
		LL ans = a*a;
		while (1) {
			poss.insert(ans);
			if (ans > MAX/a)
				break;
			ans = ans*a;
		}
	}
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++) {
		LL N;
		scanf("%lld", &N);
		if (N == 1) {
			printf("NO\n");
			continue;
		}
		LL sqt = (LL)sqrt(N);
		if (sqt*sqt == N) {
			printf("YES\n");
			continue;
		}
		if (poss.find(N) != poss.end())
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
